evidence.text: The policies and practices of Defendant outlined in paragraphs 9 through 29 constitute a pattern or practice claim under Section 707 of Title VII.

evidence.text: This action is brought on behalf of the United States to enforce Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e, et seq.

add_extracted.value: Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964

evidence.text: This action is brought on behalf of the United States to enforce Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e, et seq.
This Court has jurisdiction of this action under 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-6(b) and 28 U.S.C. §§ 1331, 1343(a)(3), and 1345.
This Court has jurisdiction of this action under 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-6(b) and 28 U.S.C. §§ 1331, 1343(a)(3), and 1345.
the policies ... does not meet the requirements of Section 703(k) of Title VII, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-2(k).
the policies ... does not meet the requirements of Section 703(k) of Title VII, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-2(k).

WHEREFORE, the United States prays that the Court order the City of Durham, and its officers, agents, employees, successors, and all persons in active concert or participation with them, including DFD to: a. refrain from using written tests to screen and select applicants for DFD entry‑level firefighter positions where such uses result in a disparate impact on African Americans, are not job related for the position in question and consistent with business necessity, and/or do not otherwise meet the requirements of Section 703(k) of Title VII, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-2(k);

add_extracted.value: Injunctive relief: order City of Durham to refrain from using written tests that result in disparate impact on African Americans

evidence.text: b. provide make whole remedial relief to all persons who have suffered individual loss as a result of the discrimination alleged in this Complaint;

add_extracted.value: Make‑whole remedial relief (damages) to persons who have suffered individual loss

evidence.text: c. adopt other appropriate nondiscriminatory measures to correct the present effects of its discriminatory policies and practices, including the use of entry‑level firefighter selection procedures that comply with Title VII.

add_extracted.value: Adoption of nondiscriminatory measures to correct present effects of discriminatory policies and practices, including compliant selection procedures

evidence.text: Plaintiff United States prays for such additional relief as justice may require, together with its costs and disbursements in this action.

add_extracted.value: Costs and disbursements in this action
